Package soot.jimple.infoflow.android

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration
    Configuration class for the Android-specific data flow analysis
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.AnalysisFileConfiguration
    The configuration for the various files required for the data flow analysis
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.CallbackConfiguration
    The configuration for analyzing callbacks in Android apps
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.IccConfiguration
    The configuration for the inter-component data flow analysis
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.SourceSinkConfiguration
    The configuration for the source and sink manager
    SetupApplication  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.CallbackAnalyzer
    Enumeration containing the supported callback analyzers
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.CallbackSourceMode
    Methods for deciding whether a parameter of a system callback is to be treated as a source or not
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.CategoryMode
    The modes (included or excludes) that a category can have for the data flow analysis
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.LayoutMatchingMode
    Possible modes for matching layout components as data flow sources
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.SootIntegrationMode
    Enumeration containing the different ways in which Soot can be used
    InfoflowAndroidConfiguration.SourceSinkFilterMode
    The default mode how the filter shall treat source or sink categories that have not been configured explicitly
